farming.name: farming
farming.title: Agriculture and farming
farming.desc: Rearing of animals or cultivation of plants, for example agriculture, irrigation, aquaculture, plantations, herding, pests and diseases affecting crops and livestock

biota.name: biota
biota.title: Flora or fauna
biota.desc: Flora or fauna in natural environment, for example wildlife, vegetation, biological sciences, ecology, wilderness, sea life, wetlands, habitat, biological resources

boundaries.name: boundaries
boundaries.title: Census and administrative boundaries
boundaries.desc: Legal land descriptions, for example political and administrative boundaries, governmental units, marine boundaries, voting districts, school districts, international boundaries

climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere.name: climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere
climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere.title: Climatology Meteorology and Atmosphere
climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere.desc: Processes and phenomena of the atmosphere, for example cloud cover, weather, climate, atmospheric conditions, climate change, precipitation

economy.name: economy
economy.title: Business and economic
economy.desc: Economic activities, conditions, and employment, for example production, labor, revenue, business, commerce, industry, tourism and ecotourism, forestry, fisheries, commercial or subsistence hunting, exploration and exploitation of resources such as minerals, oil and gas

elevation.name: elevation
elevation.title: Elevation and derived products
elevation.desc: Height above or below sea level, for example altitude, bathymetry, digital elevation models, slope, derived products, DEMs, TINs

environment.name: environment
environment.title: Environment and conservation
environment.desc: Environmental resources, protection and conservation, for example environmental pollution, waste storage and treatment, environmental impact assessment, monitoring environmental risk, nature reserves, landscape, water quality, air quality, environmental modeling

geoscientificInformation.name: geoscientificInformation
geoscientificInformation.title: Geological and geophysical
geoscientificInformation.desc: Information pertaining to earth sciences, for example geophysical features and processes, geology, minerals, sciences dealing with the composition, structure and origin of the earth's rocks, risks of earthquakes, volcanic activity, landslides, gravity information, soils, permafrost, hydrogeology, groundwater, erosion

health.name: health
health.title: Health
health.desc: Health, health services, human ecology, and safety, for example disease and illness, factors affecting health, hygiene, substance abuse, mental and physical health, health services, health care providers, public health

imageryBaseMapsEarthCover.name: imageryBaseMapsEarthCover
imageryBaseMapsEarthCover.title: Imagery, base maps, and land cover
imageryBaseMapsEarthCover.desc: Base maps, for example land/earth cover, topographic maps, imagery, unclassified images, annotations, digital ortho imagery

intelligenceMilitary.name: intelligenceMilitary
intelligenceMilitary.title: Military and intelligence
intelligenceMilitary.desc: Military bases, structures, activities, for example barracks, training grounds, military transportation, information collection

inlandWaters.name: inlandWaters
inlandWaters.title: Inland water resources
inlandWaters.desc: Inland water features, drainage systems and characteristics, for example rivers and glaciers, salt lakes, water utilization plans, dams, currents, floods and flood hazards, water quality, hydrographic charts, watersheds, wetlands, hydrography

location.name: location
location.title: Locations and geodetic networks
location.desc: Positional information and services, for example addresses, geodetic networks, geodetic control points, postal zones and services, place names, geographic names

oceans.name: oceans
oceans.title: Oceans
oceans.desc: Features and characteristics of salt water bodies (excluding inland waters), for example tides, tidal waves, coastal information, reefs, maritime, outer continental shelf submerged lands, shoreline

planningCadastre.name: planningCadastre
planningCadastre.title: Cadastral/Planning
planningCadastre.desc: Information used for appropriate actions for future use of the land, for example land use maps, zoning maps, cadastral surveys, land ownership, parcels, easements, tax maps, federal land ownership status, public land conveyance records

society.name: society
society.title: Cultural, society, and demographic
society.desc: Characteristics of society and culture, for example settlements, housing, anthropology, archaeology, education, traditional beliefs, manners and customs, demographic data, tourism, recreational areas and activities, parks, recreational trails, historical sites, cultural resources, social impact assessments, crime and justice, law enforcement, census information, immigration, ethnicity

structure.name: structure
structure.title: Building Infrastructure
structure.desc: Man-made construction, for example buildings, museums, churches, factories, housing, monuments, shops, towers, building footprints, architectural and structural plans

transportation.name: transportation
transportation.title: Transportation networks
transportation.desc: Means and aids for conveying persons or goods, for example roads, airports/airstrips, shipping routes, tunnels nautical charts, vehicle or vessel location, aeronautical charts, railways

utilitiesCommunication.name: utilitiesCommunication
utilitiesCommunication.title: Utilities/Communication
utilitiesCommunication.desc: Energy, water and waste systems and communications infrastructure and services, for example hydroelectricity, geothermal, solar and nuclear sources of energy, water purification and distribution, sewage collection and disposal, electricity and gas distribution, data communication, telecommunication, radio, communication networks

historic.name: historic
historic.title: Historical Scanned Maps
historic.desc: Non-digital maps that have been scanned

DATA_TABLE.QUERY_PANEL_TIP: Click a field name for use in query statement. Next, select and operator. Use numeric or string values, and wrap strings with single quotes ' '.
DATA_TABLE.exportQueryTooltip: Export the query results as an Excel (.xls) table
